      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBaselineFromMenuBar()
      If the user chooses to add or edit a baseline from the menu bar feature.
      void changeDatabasePath()
      Changes the path string located in the file path.dat to a new path that the user gets with a file chooser.
      void changeSelectedBaseline()
      Changes the currently selected baseline inside of the combobox in each menu.
      void disableMenuButtons()
      Disables the buttons on the left side of the main menu
      void enableMenuButtons()
      Enables the buttons on the left side of the main menu
      void exitProgram()
      Handles the action when the user selects exit button.
      void initialize()
      This method will be called upon creating this window.
      void systemLogout()
      This method gets called when the user selects 'Logout' from the File menu on the menu bar.
      void viewAddItemMenu() 
      void viewArchive()
      Opens the archive window if a user selects the 'View Archive' button
      void viewChangeAdminPassword()
      Opens the Change Admin Password window when the user selects the 'Change Admin Password' menu item in the file menu bar while logged in as an admin.
      void viewEstimationBase()
      Set the estimation base pane to visible when button is hit.
      void viewMainScIcr()
      Set the SC/ICR entry pane to visible when button is hit.
      void viewRequirementsEntry()
      Set the requirements pane to visible when button is hit.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method will be called upon creating this window.

      • changeSelectedBaseline

        public void changeSelectedBaseline()
        Changes the currently selected baseline inside of the combobox in each menu.

      • viewEstimationBase

        public void viewEstimationBase()
        Set the estimation base pane to visible when button is hit. All others are set to invisible.

      • viewRequirementsEntry

        public void viewRequirementsEntry()
        Set the requirements pane to visible when button is hit. All others are set to invisible.

      • viewMainScIcr

        public void viewMainScIcr()
        Set the SC/ICR entry pane to visible when button is hit. All others are set to invisible.

      • changeDatabasePath

        public void changeDatabasePath()
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.net.URISyntaxException,
                               java.sql.SQLException
        Changes the path string located in the file path.dat to a new path that the user gets with a file chooser.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If I/O error occurs.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - If path cannot be found.
        java.sql.SQLException - If connection cannot be found.

      • addBaselineFromMenuBar

        public void addBaselineFromMenuBar()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        If the user chooses to add or edit a baseline from the menu bar feature.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If I/O error occurs.

      • viewArchive

        public void viewArchive()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Opens the archive window if a user selects the 'View Archive' button
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If I/O error occurs.

      • systemLogout

        public void systemLogout()
        This method gets called when the user selects 'Logout' from the File menu on the menu bar. When this method is called the system is set to a logged out state.

      • enableMenuButtons

        public void enableMenuButtons()
        Enables the buttons on the left side of the main menu

      • disableMenuButtons

        public void disableMenuButtons()
        Disables the buttons on the left side of the main menu

      • viewChangeAdminPassword

        public void viewChangeAdminPassword()
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Opens the Change Admin Password window when the user selects the 'Change Admin Password' menu item in the file menu bar while logged in as an admin.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If I/O error occurs.

      • viewAddItemMenu

        public void viewAddItemMenu()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • exitProgram

        public void exitProgram()
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Handles the action when the user selects exit button.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If the connection could not close successfully.
